comment.author: 58807946@N06
comment._content: This may be a Casasola shot from Mexico City ca Feb 1912, leading up to the assassination of Francisco Madero, "la decena tragiaca" as it is known.

comment.author: 53461717@N08
comment._content:
The Ten Tragic Days (Decena Trágica) took place between 9 and 18 February, 1913.
The soldiers (on plain clothes) were most likely felicistas (supporters of Félix Díaz)
Most of the parapets, guns and machineguns were located by avaenid Balderas or arround the arsenal known as La Ciudadela.
Dr. Roberto Duarte
Plastic Surgeon
